title: MASSIVE ranked bug
body:
I have been completely dumbfounded recently by a bug i have noticed whilst playing ranked.

Now before you go ranting at me saying "its not a bug" or "it has not been tested thoroughly enough"...believe me, i have tested this bug for months now and i believe i have sufficient evidence to bring it to the attention of the boards and hopefully riot.


I bet a lot of you have encountered this bug without even noticing so i will explain it here so you can see for yourselves.

I am ranked at gold and i play ranked every now and then. I dont take climbing seriously and i do my best to try hard and be positive in all my games. 

But for some reason even though i deserved diamond, im not ranking up?? i cant for the life of me figure out what the heck is going on..
then it dawned on me, obviously im not gaining elo for my performances. sometimes ill even sit in bushes and hide away from teamfights i think we'll lose so i can keep my k/d very good. but STILL..... no rank up. 

I think this needs to be seriously be looked at because im getting pretty frustrated that my skill is not being rewarded.

thanks guys!
